Parameters.Name: pLogOutput
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: Write parameters and action summary to server message log (Boolean True = 1)

Parameters.Name: pStrictErrorHandling
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: On encountering any error, exit with major error status by ProcessQuit after writing to the server message log (Boolean True = 1)

Parameters.Name: pDim
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: Dimension name or list? (accepts wildcards). Will process ALL if = *

Parameters.Name: pHier
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: Hierarchy name or list? (accepts wildcards). Will process ALL if = *

Parameters.Name: pFirst
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: 0 = Ignore 1st character requirements, 1 = Validate 1st character more stringently than other characters (e.g. for MDX no "+" as 1st character)

Parameters.Name: pDelim
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: Delimiter for dimension list (If blank or not passed then "&" will be used as default list delimiter)
